pages.title: Gemstone Glass
pages.text: $(italic)Your gemstones are already slightly transparent by nature. What could be more natural than to form a kind of glass from these materials?$(br)At first glance not exactly inexpensive, it is virtually a renewable raw material. Renewable windows!$()

pages.title: Pedestal Recipe
pages.text: Gemstone Glass comes in all the colors of gemstones available to you.
